org.iotivity.base

Class OcProvisioning

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.iotivity.base.OcProvisioning

  • public class OcProvisioning
extends java.lang.Object
    OcProvisionig represents functions corresponding to the provisioing of resources.

    • Method Detail

      • provisionInit

        public static void provisionInit(java.lang.String dbPath)
                          throws OcException
        Method to Initialize Provisioning Manager.This will load the provisioning Manager's persistent database.
        Parameters:
        dbPath - dbPath file path of the sqlite3 db.
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate initialization failure. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

      • provisionClose

        public static void provisionClose()
                           throws OcException
        Method is used by provisioning manager to close provisioning database.
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate failure. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

      • discoverUnownedDevices

        public static java.util.List<OcSecureResource> discoverUnownedDevices(int timeout)
                                                               throws OcException
        Method to Discover un-owned devices in its subnet.Un-owned devices need to be owned by calling ownershipTransferCBdata.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in sec.Time to listen for responses before returining the Array.
        Returns:
        Array of OcSecureResource class objects.
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate discovery failure. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

        Throws:

      • SetownershipTransferCBdata

        public static void SetownershipTransferCBdata(OxmType type,
                                              OcProvisioning.PinCallbackListener pinCallbackListener)
                                       throws OcException
        Deprecated. use setOwnershipTransferCBdata(org.iotivity.base.OxmType, org.iotivity.base.OcProvisioning.PinCallbackListener) instead.
        API for registering Ownership transfer methods for a particular transfer Type
        Parameters:
        type - OxmType ownership transfer type.
        pinCallbackListener - Pin callback Listener.
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate failure registering ownership transfer. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

        Parameters:
        displayNumListener - callback Listener to be registered for displaying VerifyNUm.
        Throws:

      • unsetDisplayNumListener

        public static int unsetDisplayNumListener()
                                   throws OcException
        API to unregister DisplayNumListener Listener
        Returns:
        0 on success, 1 on failure
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate failure to unregister the DisplayNumListener Listener. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

        confirmNumListener - callback Listener to be registered for getting user confirmation.

      • setMVJustWorksOptions

        public static int setMVJustWorksOptions(java.util.EnumSet<MVJustWorksOptionMask> optionMask)
                                 throws OcException
        API to set options for Mutual Verified Just-works Default is for both screen PIN display and get user confirmation.
        Parameters:
        optionMask - Verification Method Options
        Returns:
        0 on success
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate failure to set the Mutual Verified Just-works options. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

      • getDeviceStatusList

        public static java.util.List<OcSecureResource> getDeviceStatusList(int timeout)
                                                            throws OcException
        Method to get Array of owned and un-owned devices in the current subnet.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout in sec for the API to return.
        Returns:
        Array of OcSecureResource class objects. be provisioned.
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate failure to get array of devices. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

      • saveTrustCertChain

        public static int saveTrustCertChain(byte[] trustCertChain,
                                     EncodingType encodingType)
                              throws OcException
        Method to save the Trust certificate chain to SVR.
        Parameters:
        trustCertChain - Trust certificate chain to be saved in Cred of SVR.
        encodingType - Encoding type of trust certificate chain to be saved in Cred of SVR
        Returns:
        CredId of saved trust certificate chain in Cred of SVR.
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate failure to save the trust certificate chain. Use OcException.GetErrorCode() for more details.

      • setDeviceIdSeed

        public static int setDeviceIdSeed(byte[] seed)
                           throws OcException
        Method to save the seed value to generate device UUID
        Parameters:
        seed - buffer of seed value
        Returns:
        -1 if TLS not enabled return 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        OcException - Indicate falure setting the device UUID seed
